survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction with the features and usability of our mobile banking app to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use our mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection to allow users to select multiple features.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall usability of the app? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall usability of the app? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What do you like most about our mobile banking app?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 4 or 5
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture positive feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What do you like most about our mobile banking app?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 4 or 5

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our mobile banking app?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 1, 2, or 3
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather constructive feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our mobile banking app?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 1, 2, or 3

questions.question_text: How easy is it to navigate through the app?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to measure ease of navigation.

script.question_text: How easy is it to navigate through the app?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using the app?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to identify technical issues.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using the app?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issues you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather details about technical issues. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issues you encountered.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our mobile banking app to others? (1 = Not likely, 10 = Very likely)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a 10-point scale for this question to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our mobile banking app to others? (1 = Not likely, 10 = Very likely)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or feedback about our mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any additional feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or feedback about our mobile banking app?
